full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/23/2023 STATE OF CALIFORNIA ) I ) SS. COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES ) 2 3 4 AFFIDAVIT 5 6 I, KARTAR KAUR, after being duly sworn according to 7 law, hereby depose and say: 8 That I am presently residing at 2108 Gardi Street, 9 Bradbury, California 91010; 10 That I was born on September 9, 1909 in Kalsian Kalan, 11 India; 12 That I am the mother-in-law of Narinderjit Singh Keith; 13 That Narinderjit Singh Keith was born on August 1, 1930 14 in Ponjab, India; 15 That his parents names are Jaswant Singh and Kaur Beant- 16 Kaur; 17 That I am executing this affidavit in lieu of 18 Narinderjit Singh Keith's birth certificate which is unavailable 19 and also to state that he is the legitimate son of Jaswnat 20 Singh and Kaur Beant-Kaur; 21 That since I am the mother-in-law - - of Narinderjit Singh 22 Keith and very close to the family, I know the facts very well; 23 That stated facts are true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and I also know THIS to make a false affidavit COPY WITH 24 CERTIFY THATIHAVE AND COMPLE 25 is a criminal of fence programy is A TRU ITS ORIGINAL AND DATE 3-11-87 26 DATED: 10-31-86 TWINSTION SIGNED 27 SUITE 780 28 KARTAR KAUR Subscribed and sworns to before me this 90211 day of Octoberm 1986. BEVERLY Notary Public Tom Singh OFFICIAL SEAL STATE ROMA SINGH NOTARY PUBLIC . CALIFORNIA PRINCIPAL OFFICE IN LOS ANGELES COUNTY MY COMMISSION EXPIRES AUG. 21. 1987
